Wave Breaker

two handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 98
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #913 Friendly Currents
water breathing [waterbreathing]: 1
weap id [weapon]: 83 (Wave Breaker)
damage [dmg]: 10
attack [att]: +3

nbr of attacks [nratt]: 3
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Piercing Damage [pierce], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 15W to forge (W3)

The wielder of this trident will be able to command the currents of the sea to help him and his friends. When used during battle, the Wave Breaker strikes with incredible speed. The trident gives the wielder the ability to breathe underwater.
